Text.Page:
It's the {@LinkCreature:4#1011#fangspawns}. All bite, no bark. Reach out to them, and you'll pull back a bloody stump.

Wipe out the fangspawns, and bring back their hearts. Then we'll be getting somewhere.

The smell repels other meat-eaters.
Those fangspawns breed fast, but you kill 'em even faster, eh?

Look, we can't reopen the mines until the fangspawns are taken care of.

It's hard to swing a pick when some fangspawn has chewed your arms off!
